components.mentoring.session.automatedFe:
**Functional Purpose**: Summary message indicating the student received automated feedback
**UI Location**: Mentoring session → Automated feedback summary button
**When Users See This**: When viewing a mentoring session where automated feedback has been provided (user is student)
**Technical Context**: Text depends on whether the current user is the student. No variables.
**Current English**: "You received automated feedback"

**Functional Purpose**: Summary message indicating the student received automated feedback

**Functional Purpose**: Accessibility text for an icon indicating content opens in a modal
